mapper.select: SELECT A.EVL_ID , E.EVL_KND_CD_ID , A.OBJECT_ID , A.EXC_USER_ID , A.EXC_USER_BGNDE , A.EXC_CN , A.EXC_SJ , A.EXC_COMPT_CD_ID , CONVERT ( VARCHAR , CONVERT ( DATE , A.EXC_DE , 112 ) , 23 ) EXC_DE , A.STTUS_CD_ID , A.SANCTN_ID , A.UNITY_ID , A.RGS_DT , A.RGS_USER_ID , A.UPD_DT , A.UPD_USER_ID , CASE WHEN E.EVL_KND_CD_ID = 'CTW_103_001' OR E.EVL_KND_CD_ID = 'CTW_103_002' THEN (CASE WHEN CU.CNRL_ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) WHEN E.EVL_KND_CD_ID = 'CTW_103_003' OR E.EVL_KND_CD_ID = 'CTW_103_004' THEN (CASE WHEN ECU.CNRL_ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) END AS CNRL_UPDT_CHECK_FLAG , UC.CONFM_AT , UC.CONFM_CN , UH.USER_NM AS CONFM_USER_NM FROM TB_CW_UPRPD_EXC A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CW_EVL E ON A.EVL_ID = E.EVL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CW_UPRPD_CONFM UC ON A.EVL_ID = UC.EVL_ID AND A.OBJECT_ID = UC.OBJECT_ID AND UC.LAST_AT = 'Y' AND UC.STTUS_CD_ID = 'COM_021_005' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CO_USER_HIST UH ON UC.CONFM_USER_ID = UH.USER_ID AND UC.CONFM_USER_BGNDE = UH.HIST_BGNDE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CW_UPRPD_CNRL_UPDT CU ON A.EVL_ID = CU.EVL_ID AND A.OBJECT_ID = CU.CNRL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CW_UPRPD_ELC_CNRL_UPDT ECU ON A.EVL_ID = ECU.EVL_ID AND A.OBJECT_ID = ECU.CNRL_ID WHERE A.EVL_ID = #{evlId} AND A.OBJECT_ID = #{objectId}

SELECT EX.EVL_ID --평가ID , EX.OBJECT_ID --OBJECT ID , CO.CONFM_SN --승인 순번 , CO.CONFM_AT --승인 여부 , CASE WHEN CO.CONFM_AT = 'N' THEN '반려' ELSE '승인' END AS CONFM_STTUS_CD_NM --승인 상태 , CO.CONFM_CN --승인 내용 , CO.CONFM_USER_ID --승인 사용자ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_CO_USER_HIST WHERE USER_ID = CO.CONFM_USER_ID AND HIST_ENDDE = '99991231' ) AS CONFM_USER_NM --승인자 이름 , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM TB_CO_USER_HIST WHERE USER_ID = CO.CONFM_USER_ID AND HIST_BGNDE = CO.CONFM_USER_BGNDE ) AS CONFM_DEPT_NM --승인자 부서명 , CONVERT ( VARCHAR , CO.CONFM_DT , 23 ) AS CONFM_DT --승인 일시 FROM TB_CW_UPRPD_EXC EX INNER JOIN TB_CW_UPRPD_CONFM CO ON EX.EVL_ID = CO.EVL_ID AND EX.OBJECT_ID = CO.OBJECT_ID WHERE EX.EVL_ID = #{evlId} AND EX.OBJECT_ID = #{objectId} ORDER BY CONFM_SN ASC
SELECT EVL_ID ,CNRL_ID FROM TB_CW_UPRPD_CNRL_UPDT WHERE EVL_ID = #{evlId} AND CNRL_ID = #{objectId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_CW_UPRPD_CNRL_UPDT WHERE EVL_ID = #{evlId} AND CNRL_ID = #{cnrlId}
